name: Thought Bomb Tee
description:
Designer: Anthony Lane

A subtle tee with a not-so-subtle message. This tee is for the individual who’s comfortable dropping the hint that they might, at any moment, poke convention squarely in the eye. Or sucker-punch the status quo. You just never know. Well-suited for: Philosophical debates with strangers. Repeatedly shouting the phrase “Did that just blow your mind?” Deep conversations over drinkies. Competitive Jai alai. Completely ill-equipped for: Tea and crumpets. Your great uncle. Walking through airport security looking sketchy. The important physical details: Classic unisex fit. Not too tight, not too loose. 100% Organic Cotton (40 Singles) Low-impact fabric dyed, satin garment washed for a super-soft hand Resilient fabric

name: Unknown Rebel Tee
description:
Designer: Anthony Lane

Exuding a simple sophistication, this tee is the elegant and understated counterpoint to the Thought Bomb. If one is a poke in the eye, the other is a gentle grasp of the arm prompting a more subtle conversation about something important. Urgent, subtle, but strong. Well-suited for: Margaritas and chips at the local Mexican joint. Feeling smarter than everyone else in the room, but totally not letting on about it. Dancing along with any song by Deee-Lite. Completely ill-equipped for: Any court appearance whatsoever. Important job interviews. Tornado Alley. But then, what’s ever really ready for that. The important physical details: Women’s regular fit with a shallow scoop neck. Not too tight, not too loose. 100% Organic Cotton (40 Singles) Low-impact fabric dyed, satin garment washed for a super-soft hand Resilient fabric

name: Mandala Tee
description:
Designer: Us & Them Studio

This one’s deep. Mandalas have been used to help focus the mind and aid in meditation for centuries. Our’s just happens to be wired with explosives. Why? The simple answer is we want you thinking about what you can do to change things. To blow up convention and make the world better. Then when you’re done thinking about it, DO something. That’s where it gets exciting. Well-suited for: Provoking “what if” conversations. Philosophy class. Impressing members of the opposite sex with how deep you are. Completely ill-equipped for: Half-price wings night. “T.J. Hooker” Marathons. The Humpty Dance. The important physical details: Classic unisex fit. Not too tight, not too loose. Eco-Heather (20 Singles): 38% cotton (6.25% organic cotton), 50% polyester (6.25% recycled poly), 12% naturally occurring rayon Low-impact yarn dyed, fabric washed for a super-soft hand
